ðŸ“– Summary: dnSurfer is a proof-of-concept web browser that operates entirely over DNS, enabling text-only browsing by converting DNS queries into web content. It uses a client-server architecture with a custom DNS server and an Electron-based desktop application. The primary use case is to bypass network restrictions and captive portals.
